article.title: United Launch Services Receives $575 Million Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: United Launch Services LLC, Littleton, Colorado, is being awarded a not-to-exceed $575 million contract to provide Evolved Expendable Launch Vehicle launch services in support of the following missions: Mobile User Objective Services 2; Wideband Global Satellite Communications 6; and National Reconnaissance Office Launch 65. The Space and Missile Systems Center/Launch and Range Systems Directorate, El Segundo Air Force Base, California, is the contracting activity.
